titleStmt.title: A discourse, proving from Scripture and reason that the life of man is not limited by any absolute decree of God by the author of The duty of man, &c.
titleStmt.author: Author of The duty of man.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Henry Bonwicke ...,

notesStmt.note: First pt.: Of the period of human life; 2nd pt.: A defense of the book entituled A discourse concerning the period of human life.
